title: Channel Islands National Park: Live Broadcasts
body: Channel Islands Live Broadcasts       Channel Islands Live is an exciting new way to experience the wild, isolated land and seascapes of your national park and national marine sanctuary. Take a virtual visit to the Channel Islands through live broadcasts from Anacapa Island that highlight the remarkable natural and cultural resources of the islands and their surrounding waters. Please see the schedule below for live program dates and times. Live programs are weather and equipment dependent. Highlights from previous broadcasts are shown when live events are not scheduled or when live events are canceled due to weather, power, or transmission issues. Previous broadcasts may also be viewed at Archived Programs.              If there is a problem with the video on this page, please view the live stream at Explore.org. There is no technical support regarding the this stream. However, we do welcome your feedback: e-mail us  Please note that live broadcasts are occasionally cancelled at the last minute due to weather, power, and transmission issues.    Partnership Channel Islands Live is made possible through an educational partnership between the National Park Service, Explore.org, and Ventura County Office of Education.      Live Broadcast Schedule  Search for Events       By Date     Start Date      End Date           By Keyword By Keyword        Search          Upcoming Events    Showing 1 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Channel Islands National Park Channel Islands Live Friday, August 19, 2016   Take a virtual visit to the Channel Islands through live broadcasts from Anacapa Island that highlight the remarkable natural and cultural resources of the islands and their surrounding waters. More     Time: 1:00 PM to 1:30 PM   Location: On the web at link below or Anacapa Island or Visitor Center in Ventura   Fees: Free
